title: Duster Announce Tour, Surprise Release New Album In Dreams: Listen
description: The third new studio LP from the slowcore band since it reunited in 2018

title: Jack White Blasts Trump Aide Over “Seven Nation Army” Video
description: “Law suit coming from my lawyers about this,” the White Stripes musician threatened

title: Jamie xx Enlists Panda Bear, Kelsey Lu, and John Glacier for New Song “Dafodil”: Listen
description: “‘Dafodil’ was one of the first pieces of music that I made for this album,” Jamie xx stated of his In Waves single, “it was actually the song that made me realise I could finally make another album”

title: Ween Stop Touring “for the Foreseeable Future,” Citing Dean Ween’s Mental Health
description: After canceling shows in April and August, the band is taking a break from the road

description: The Run the Jewels artists reconnect for a new single for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6

title: ABBA Also Want Trump to Stop Playing Their Music
description: Beyoncé, Celine Dion, Foo Fighters, and Isaac Hayes’ estate have lately pushed back against the Republican presidential candidate’s use of their songs

title: The Cure to Release New Songs on Live Vinyl Single
description: An eco-vinyl from Naked Record Club will feature “And Nothing Is Forever” and “I Can Never Say Goodbye”

title: Christine and the Queens Performs at Paris 2024 Paralympic Games Opening Ceremony: Watch
description: The French musician did a unique rendition of Édith Piaf’s “Non, je ne regrette rien” and the Patrick Hernandez disco hit “Born to Be Alive”

title: TV on the Radio Might Be Up to Something
description: The long-dormant band updated its social media pages and website with a new teaser

title: Listen to SOPHIE and Bibi Bourelly’s New Song “Exhilarate”
description: The fourth preview of the posthumous album SOPHIE

title: Bryan Ferry Returns With New Song Conceived With Nine Inch Nails: Listen
description: “Star,” which began as a “sketch” by Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross, is Ferry’s first original song in a decade

title: Modest Mouse Selling Vintage Synths, Amps, Pedals, Microphones, and More on Reverb
description: Frontman Isaac Brock is unloading a 150-watt Soursound Audio Custom Amp head, a Moog Voyager XL, some Soviet-era gear, and more from his massive collection

title: Evilgiane and Nourished by Time Share New Song “Instant Death”: Listen
description: The Surf Gang leader and Erotic Probiotic 2 musician connect for an instrumental track that also features producer Goner

title: Oasis Dispel Glastonbury 2025 Rumors
description: The reunited band quells speculation over festival appearances, diverting attention to its stadium shows

title: Martin Shkreli Ordered to Turn Over Digital Copies of His Forfeited Wu-Tang Clan Album
description: The new owner of Once Upon a Time in Shaolin, which is supposed to be one-of-a-kind, says that the disgraced former pharmaceutical executive has been playing digital copies for others

title: The Breeders’ Kim Deal Announces Debut Solo Album, Shares New Song: Listen
description: The legendary indie-rock musician worked on Nobody Loves You More with Steve Albini, Kelley Deal, and more

title: Bruce Springsteen Covers Jesse Malin’s “She Don’t Love Me Now”: Listen
description: A tribute to the New York musician for the covers compilation Silver Patron Saints

description: “Lucky #8” arrives with a visual compiling vintage clips of historic gymnastics routines

title: Kim Gordon and Model Home Share Video for New Song “Razzamatazz”: Watch
description: The collaborative track also features Justin Raisen, who worked with Gordon on The Collective and No Home Record

title: Caribou Announces New Album Honey, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
description: A dancer in a big Dan Snaith mask dances around London in the video for “Come Find Me,” which appears on the producer’s first Caribou record in four years

title: The Smile Announce Second Album of 2024, Share Videos for New Songs: Watch
description: Swiftly after their January LP, Wall of Eyes, Thom Yorke, Jonny Greenwood, and Tom Skinner return with Cutouts

title: Godspeed You! Black Emperor Announce New Album “No Title As of 13 February 2024 28,340 Dead”, Share Song: Listen
description: The Canadian post-rock band will tour extensively in support of its follow-up to 2021’s G_d’s Pee at State’s End!

title: Bad Bunny Cast in New Darren Aronofsky Movie
description: Caught Stealing is a crime thriller based on Charlie Huston’s novel of the same name

description: A Camper-produced single from the R&B stalwarts

title: Tucker Zimmerman Works With Big Thief on New 4AD Album Dance of Love

title: Oasis Announce 2025 Reunion Shows

title: Sabrina Carpenter, Yaeji, Geordie Greep, Chuckyy, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
description: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat
